list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add CoinGecko integration and top coins command
This commit introduces a CoinGecko API integration to fetch the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market cap. Additionally, a `/top_coins` command is added to the bot, displaying the latest prices in USD. Updates include logging improvements, refined bot functionality, and handler modifications.Add .gitignore for excluded files and update workspace.xml
Added a new `.gitignore` file to exclude `bot_log.log` and made updates to the IntelliJ workspace configuration in `workspace.xml`. These changes enhance project organization and ensure unnecessary files are not tracked.

task.summary:
Add initial project files and bot setup
This commit initializes the CoinAlertBot project with all necessary configuration files, the main bot startup script, and version control setup. Sensitive data is stored in the .env file, which is appropriately excluded using .gitignore.

MESSAGE.value:
Add functionality for retrieving and displaying top crypto coins
Implemented integration with CoinGecko API to fetch top 100 crypto coins and display their prices. Added a new `/top_coins` command to the bot, along with required handlers, logging improvements, and configuration updates.

Add initial project files and bot setup
This commit initializes the CoinAlertBot project with all necessary configuration files, the main bot startup script, and version control setup. Sensitive data is stored in the .env file, which is appropriately excluded using .gitignore.

Add CoinGecko integration and top coins command
This commit introduces a CoinGecko API integration to fetch the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market cap. Additionally, a `/top_coins` command is added to the bot, displaying the latest prices in USD. Updates include logging improvements, refined bot functionality, and handler modifications.

Updates include logging improvements, refined bot functionality, and handler modifications.Add .gitignore for excluded files and update workspace.xml
